title: 6.1 Master Challenge 1
question:
The following pictograph shows the number of chocolates produced by a factory in a particular week.

Q1. Prepare a table in Excel with the above data.
Q2. Find the total number of chocolates produced daily.
Q3. Determine the overall production of chocolates in the week.
Q4. Prepare a report using appropriate graph / chart to visualize the given data.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
